bibl.title: Seeking Aphrodisios and Philoxenos. Personal Names as a Criterion for Identification in Some Early Roman Papyri in the John Rylands Library.

bibl.seg: William Mundy, Seeking Aphrodisios and Philoxenos. Personal Names as a Criterion for Identification in Some Early Roman Papyri in the John Rylands Library.
Per una prosopografia dell'Egitto romano: metodi, problemi, proposte. Workshop internazionale (Padova, 23-24 luglio 2015) = Aegyptus 95 (2015) pp. 157-169; - 212.
